item.title: This Life-Changing Trick Will Show You How to Instantly Check Your Last iCloud Backup on Your MacBook Pro!
item.description: Introduction Staying on top of your iCloud backups is essential to make sure you never lose important data. While iCloud backups are automatically created, it can be difficult to know when your last backup was made. Fortunately, thereâ€™s a simple trick that will show you how to instantly check your last iCloud backup on your MacBook Pro. Definition of iCloud Backup An iCloud backup is a copy of all the data that is stored on your MacBook Pro.
